verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] [V: weighed] in [ARG1: on the controversy surrounding a racist tweet sent by Roseanne Barr] . The tweet , along with other controversial posts , led ABC to cancel her show .
